text: setochini satinekwachewi (satigenanyu)፤ weyimi lenesu mehirini satiwesinulachewi bitifetwachewi benanite layi hat’i’ati yelebachihumi፡፡ (daregoti bemesit’eti mefitati tichilalachihu፡፡) t’ik’emwachewimi፡፡ behabitami layi chilotawi bedihami layi chilotawi (ak’imu yemifek’idewini mesit’eti) alebeti፡፡ melikami yehoneni met’ik’emi bebego seriwochi layi yeteregaget’eni፤ (t’ik’emwachewi)፡፡
